playwrightConfig.description: Path to the playwright config file (.ts or .js).

devServerTarget.description: Target to serve the application to run e2e tests against.

baseUrl.description: The address (with the port) which your application is running on.

headed.description: Run tests in headed browsers. Useful for debugging.

browser.description: Run test in a specific browser. Available options are "chromium", "firefox", "webkit" or "all" to run tests in all three browsers at the same time.

debug.description: Run tests with Playwright Inspector. Shortcut for PWDEBUG=1 environment variable and --timeout=0 --maxFailures=1 --headed --workers=1 options.

forbidOnly.description: Whether to disallow 'test.only'. Useful on CI.

grep.description: Only run tests matching this regular expression. For example, this will run 'should add to cart' when passed -g "add to cart".

grepInvert.description: Only run tests not matching this regular expression. The opposite of 'grep'.

globalTimeout.description: Total timeout for the whole test run in milliseconds. By default, there is no global timeout.

list.description: List all the tests, but do not run them.

maxFailures.description: Stop after the first N test failures. Passing -x stops after the first failure.

outputPath.description: Directory for artifacts produced by tests.

pwProject.description: Only run tests from one of the specified projects. Defaults to running all projects defined in the configuration file.

quiet.description: Whether to suppress stdout and stderr from the tests.

repeatEach.description: Run each test N times, defaults to one.

reporter.description: Choose a reporter: minimalist <dot>, concise <line> or detailed <list>. See https://playwright.dev/docs/test-reporters for more information.

retries.description: The maximum number of retries for flaky tests, defaults to zero (no retries).

shard.description: Shard tests and execute only selected shard, specified in the form current/all, 1-based, for example 3/5.

timeout.description: Maximum timeout in milliseconds for each test, defaults to 30 seconds.

ui.description: Whether to run with the Playwright UI Mode. Useful for debugging.

updateSnapshots.description: Whether to update snapshots with actual results instead of comparing them. Use this when snapshot expectations have changed.

workers.description: The maximum number of concurrent worker processes that run in parallel.
